It gets a PlayerAction and parse it The switch selects the Action that a player intends to perform and calls.

update(ServerResponse) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.View
This method moves the mechanic of the game: it receives the response from the server, parse it to identify the kind of action and ask the user to insert the correct input
update(ServerResponse) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.gui.SwingView
This method moves the mechanic of the game: it receives the response from the server, and creates the respective action of the player.
update(ServerResponse) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.RemoteView
The model notifies the remote view with a ServerResponse It is received here and it is sent asynchronously via the connection to the client

updateTurn() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.Model
It updates the current turn if it is red than it updates to blue if it is blue it checks the number of players.
